blockPort

public final void blockPort(java.lang.String label,
                            boolean state)
Description copied from interface: distributed.plugin.runtime.ICommunicable
Set a new blocking state of a given local port of this entity. By default each entity's ports are not blocked NOTE: If it is Bidirectional link, it will block both incoming and out going ports

Specified by:
blockPort in interface distributed.plugin.runtime.ICommunicable
Parameters:
label - A local port label of this enity
state - True is for block, False is unblock
See Also:
ICommunicable.blockPort(java.lang.String, boolean)

getCurrentMessageCasualTime

public int getCurrentMessageCasualTime()
Get current messages casual time
A message casual time is a sum of successive messages that has been caused by another message.
Example
msgA -> msgB -> msgC -> msgE
        msgB -> msgD -> msgF -> msgG

In this example msgA causes the creation of msgB, and msgB causes the creation of msgC and msgD, and msgD casue msgF and so on, while msgE has no cause to creation of any message.

The current message casual time when msgG is created is 4 becasue there are 4 hops from msgA to msgG from this illustration

Returns:
a message casual time which start from the beging of the process to a current call of this method

getInPorts

public final java.util.List getInPorts()
Get all incomming port labels of this entity

Returns:
A list of String of all incomming port labels

getPorts

public final java.util.List getPorts()

Returns:
A list of String of all local port labels

sendToAll

public final void sendToAll(java.lang.String msgLabel,
                            short message)
Send a given message with a given label through all out going ports

Specified by:
sendToAll in interface distributed.plugin.runtime.ICommunicable
Parameters:
msgLabel - A message label
message - A message that need to be sent

sendToOthers

public final void sendToOthers(boolean message)
Send a message to all out going ports, execept a port that it just received. NOTE: This will work only for Bidirectional link. For Uni-directional link, it will work only if a lable of incomming port is the same as out going port label. Otherwise, all out going ports will be sent.

Specified by:
sendToOthers in interface distributed.plugin.runtime.ICommunicable
Parameters:
message - A message that need to be sent

sendToOthers

public final void sendToOthers(float message)

sendToOthers

public final void sendToOthers(java.lang.String msgLabel,
                               double message)
Send a message with a given message label to all out going ports execept a port that it received latest. NOTE: This will work only for Bidirectional link. For Uni-directional link, it will work only if a lable of incomming port is the same as out going port label. Otherwise, all out going ports will be sent.

setAlarm

public final void setAlarm(short time)
Description copied from interface: distributed.plugin.runtime.ICommunicable
Set an alarm internal clock time interval, The clock will ring after a given time from the time that is set. A value of -1 means turn alarm clock off which is a default value

Specified by:
setAlarm in interface distributed.plugin.runtime.ICommunicable
Parameters:
time - An offset of waiting time
See Also:
ICommunicable.setAlarm(short)
